nodes.name: AliceSemanticBridge
nodes.purpose: Orchestrates core semantic-bridge flow; entry to ingest/search.

nodes.name: AliceSemanticBridgeEnhanced
nodes.purpose: Extended pipeline with richer scraping/processing steps.

nodes.name: AsembSearch
nodes.purpose: Search entry; routes queries to hybrid/vector search nodes.

nodes.name: ASEMBWorkflow
nodes.purpose: n8n workflow wrapper coordinating ingest/update steps.

nodes.name: Dashboard
nodes.purpose: Status/metrics endpoints; basic UI for activity and health.

nodes.name: DocumentProcessor
nodes.purpose: Cleans HTML, extracts metadata, normalizes text for chunking.

nodes.name: PgHybridQuery
nodes.purpose: Combines Postgres full-text and vector similarity for ranked results.

nodes.name: PgvectorQuery
nodes.purpose: Pure pgvector similarity search over stored embeddings.

nodes.name: PgvectorUpsert
nodes.purpose: Inserts/updates embeddings + metadata into pgvector tables.

nodes.name: RedisPublish
nodes.purpose: Publishes events (ingest complete, errors, progress) to Redis channels.

nodes.name: SitemapFetch
nodes.purpose: Fetches and parses sitemap URLs for downstream scraping.

nodes.name: TextChunk
nodes.purpose: Splits text into overlapping chunks; attaches source/offset metadata.

nodes.name: WebScrape
nodes.purpose: Fetches pages and extracts readable text content.

nodes.name: WebScrapeEnhanced
nodes.purpose: Adds robustness: sitemap fallback, rate-limits, retries, extra parsing.

notes: Node purposes inferred from registry names; file paths not enumerated in this session.
